mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yuan_transactions (user_id, amount, description, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{amount}, #{description}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT amount, description, created_at AS createdAt FROM yuan_transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM yuan_transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId}
